quoteFirst: THE BLOOD-PRESSURE ROSE RAPIDLY TO 118 MILLIMETRES.  A slow fall followed.
quoteLast: THE FOOT WAS BURNED.  A SHARP RISE IN BLOOD-PRESSURE FOLLOWED."
